0: I typical mistake is to make CSS links relative by not using / at the start of the link.
1: The WP WYSIWYG just disappeared out of no where for me.
My fix was to go to Users -> Profile (f.eks. Admin)
2: First problem was that i had set ul to float left, and when i figured out to set li to float it still disappeared.
The solution was found in Stackoverflow, which was to set ul to overflow: hidden;
3: Here is a great video about how to create a child page menu.
I did not use the array_reverse function.
